channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gone are the days of the $1 buffet in Las Vegas. Now $175 buffets offer luxury dining
item.description: Las Vegas buffets have evolved from $1 all-you-can-eat cold cuts to $175 limitless lobster and caviar

item.title: Demonstrators in Milan protest ICE unit at Winter Olympics, criticizing 'creeping fascism'
item.description: Hundreds of demonstrators have gathered in Milan to protest the deployment of ICE agents during the upcoming Winter Olympics

item.title: Punxsutawney Phil prepares to issue his Groundhog Day weather verdict
item.description: Punxsutawney Phil is set to deliver his annual weather forecast and predict either six more weeks of winter or an early spring

item.title: As officials disparage Pretti and Good, families of Black people killed by police have déjà vu
item.description: The shooting deaths of white protesters Alex Pretti and Renee Good by federal officers in Minneapolis have followed a playbook that is painfully famil...

item.title: 'Dances With Wolves' actor Nathan Chasing Horse convicted on sexual assault charges
item.description: A Nevada jury has convicted “Dances With Wolves” actor Nathan Chasing Horse of sexually assaulting a minor
